actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution stating the intention of the Congress to disapprove the proposed sales, announced by the Secretary of State on February 14, 1978, of certain military aircraft to Israel, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress intends to disapprove the proposed sale (1) of 50 F5 aircraft to Egypt, (2) of 60 F15 aircraft to Saudi Arabia, and (3) of 15 F15 aircraft and 75 F16 aircraft to Israel.

titles.title: A resolution stating the intention of the Congress to disapprove the proposed sales, announced by the Secretary of State on February 14, 1978, of certain military aircraft to Israel, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia.
